title: DeOldify
subtitle: Colorizing images and videos with AI
abstract:
DeOldify is a Deep Learning project for colorizing and restoring old images and videos.

In this presentation, you will learn what's behind DeOldify, how it achieves good results and if they are historically accurate. You will also learn how to run the model yourself on your computer or Colab to colorize pictures/videos that you have.
